p:
Our concern is with a strain of influenza that is newly emerged and so individuals can be vaccinated only when a strain-specific vaccine has been developed and tested. To accommodate this delay, the rate of immunising susceptible individuals is assumed to have the form
where
is the time when the new vaccine is ready to be dispensed. A time-varying rate of importing new infectives is realistic, but here we restrict attention to a constant importation rate
.
